LanguageData.Blinding_Horrible.label: horrible
LanguageData.Blinding_Horrible.description: Blinding people for ideoligious reasons is horrible.
LanguageData.Blindness_Elevated.label: elevated
LanguageData.Blindness_Elevated.description: The blind stand pure above the sighted.
LanguageData.Blindness_Respected.label: respected
LanguageData.Blindness_Respected.description: To be blind is a moral thing worthy of respect.
LanguageData.Blindness_Sublime.label: sublime
LanguageData.Blindness_Sublime.description: Only the blind can be truly noble, for the sighted find their minds clouded by physical vision.
